verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,-gopīnātha, yāha' vaiṣṇava lañā
yāhāṅ yāhāṅ kahe vāsā, tāhāṅ deha' lañā

synonyms: prabhu kahe—the Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; gopīnātha—My dear Gopīnātha; yāha'—please go; vaiṣṇava lañā—taking all the Vaiṣṇavas; yāhāṅ yāhāṅ—wherever; kahe—they say; vāsā—staying place; tāhāṅ—there; deha'—give; lañā—accepting.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu immediately told Gopīnātha Ācārya, "Please go with the Vaiṣṇavas and accommodate them in whatever residences Kāśī Miśra and the temple superintendent offer."
